snippet: The paper reported that a hacker collective called the Syrian Electronic Army had also targeted Time magazine and CNN, suggesting a coordinated attack.
abstract: Washington Post's Web site is briefly hacked, with visitors to some articles being redirected to site of Syrian Electronic Army, hacker collective that supports Syrian Pres Bashar al-Assad; paper reports that group had also targeted Time magazine and CNN, suggesting a coordinated attack on American news outlets.
lead_paragraph: The paper reported that a hacker collective called the Syrian Electronic Army had also targeted Time magazine and CNN, suggesting a coordinated attack.

headline.main: Washington Post Site Hacked by Syrian Group
headline.print_headline: Washington Post Site Hacked by Syrian Group
